changeSet.author: gerson
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, email VARCHAR(150) UNIQUE, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, contact_name VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(255), role SMALLINT, phone VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, creation_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, created_by VARCHAR(100), modification_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, modified_by VARCHAR(100) );

changeSet.author: gerson
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE products ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(120) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(240) NOT NULL, uom_base VARCHAR(2), uom_buy VARCHAR(5), conversion_base_to_buy DOUBLE PRECISION, current_stock INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, min_stock INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, max_stock INTEGER, stock_alert INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, creation_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, created_by VARCHAR(100), modification_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, modified_by VARCHAR(100) );
